DataElement.preferredName: Patient No Prior Radiation Therapy Comprehension Data Unknown Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A single character text field to record data of the patients comprehension of no prior radiation therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient No Prior Radiation Therapy Comprehension
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._The non-affirmative response to a question._Earlier in time or order._Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation._An ability to understand the meaning or importance of something (or the knowledge acquired as a result).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.
An ability to understand the meaning or importance of something (or the knowledge acquired as a result).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).
